titleStmt.title: An apology, or, Defence of the divine art of natural astrologie being an answer to a sermon preached in Cambridge, July 25, 1652. ... / written by the learned and ingenious mathematician, Mr. George Atwell ... ; and now published by a friend ... vvhose preface is hereunto annexed.
titleStmt.author: Atwell, George.

notesStmt.note: "Wherein all the chief objections against astrology are fully answered, and the validity of the art ... held forth and maintain'd, against Picus, Chambers, Geere, Vicars, Gattaker, Holmes, and others."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
